text: Tillman Joseph Thomas (born June 13, 1945"Grenada has a new Prime Minister" , GrenadianConnection.com, July 9, 2008.) is a Grenadian politician. He became Prime Minister of Grenada from 2008 to 2013. He has been the leader of the National Democratic Congress (NDC) since 2000. ==References== ==Other websites== * - Official site Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:Prime ministers of Grenada
title: Tillman Thomas
